Class ItemController.GetItems

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.util.ArrayList<Item>>
      • com.example.suhussai.gameshare.ItemController.GetItems
  • Enclosing class:
    ItemController

    public static class ItemController.GetItems
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.util.ArrayList<Item>>
    obtain a list of items that match the criteria (owned by owner). reference: lonelyTwitter params[0] = mode params[1] = 0. owner, 1. borrower, 2. user, 3. keyword, 4. user, 5. owner (depending on mode)
